data.lyric:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run (Single Version)]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:Berry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Run Rudolph Run (Single Version) - Chuck Berry (查克·贝里)
[00:02.45]Written by：Marvin Brodie/Johnny Marks
[00:04.90]Producer：Leonard Chess/Phil Chess
[00:07.35]Out of all the reindeers
[00:08.96]You know you're the mastermind
[00:10.87]
[00:13.44]Run run Rudolph
[00:15.05]Randalph ain't too far behind
[00:17.04]
[00:19.84]Run run Rudolph
[00:21.26]Santa's got to make it to town
[00:23.26]
[00:25.89]Santa make him hurry tell him
[00:27.43]He can take the freeway down
[00:29.24]
[00:32.10]Run run Rudolph
[00:33.44]Cause I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
[00:35.63]
[00:38.22]Said Santa to a boy
[00:39.54]Child what have you been longing for
[00:41.98]
[00:44.76]All I want for Christmas
[00:46.15]Is a Rock and Roll electric guitar
[00:47.95]
[00:50.57]And then away went Rudolph
[00:52.49]Whizzing like a shooting star
[00:54.28]
[00:57.26]Run run Rudolph Santa has to make it to town
[01:00.74]
[01:03.67]Santa make him hurry tell him
[01:05.33]He can take the freeway down
[01:07.03]
[01:10.00]Run run Rudolph reeling like a merry-go-round
[01:13.46]
[01:35.20]Run run Rudolph Santa's got to make it to town
[01:38.56]
[01:41.55]Santa make him hurry tell him
[01:43.28]He can take the freeway down
[01:45.02]
[01:47.81]Run run Rudolph
[01:49.41]I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
[01:51.20]
[01:53.85]Said Santa to a girl
[01:55.41]Child what would please you most to get
[01:57.62]
[02:00.43]A little baby doll that can cry sleep drink and wet
[02:03.74]
[02:06.35]And then away went Rudolph whizzing like a Saber jet
[02:10.17]
[02:13.05]Run run Rudolph Santa's got to make it to town
[02:16.51]
[02:19.50]Santa make him hurry tell him
[02:21.22]He can take the freeway down
[02:22.88]
[02:25.73]Run run Rudolph
[02:27.33]I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
data.trans:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run (Single Version)]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:Berry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.45]//
[00:04.90]//
[00:07.35]你在驯鹿群里出类拔萃
[00:08.96]你知道你就是首领
[00:10.87]
[00:13.44]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:15.05]兰道夫离你不远了
[00:17.04]
[00:19.84]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:21.26]圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[00:23.26]
[00:25.89]圣诞老人让他加快速度
[00:27.43]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[00:29.24]
[00:32.10]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:33.44]因为我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[00:35.63]
[00:38.22]圣诞老人对一个男孩说
[00:39.54]孩子 你一直在期待什么
[00:41.98]
[00:44.76]我圣诞节想要的礼物
[00:46.15]就是一把摇滚电吉他
[00:47.95]
[00:50.57]然后鲁道夫像流星一样
[00:52.49]嗖嗖地消失不见
[00:54.28]
[00:57.26]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:00.74]
[01:03.67]圣诞老人让他加快速度
[01:05.33]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:07.03]
[01:10.00]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:13.46]
[01:35.20]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:38.56]
[01:41.55]圣诞老人让他加快速度
[01:43.28]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:45.02]
[01:47.81]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[01:49.41]我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:51.20]
[01:53.85]圣诞老人对一个女孩说
[01:55.41]你最想要的礼物是什么
[01:57.62]
[02:00.43]一个可爱的洋娃娃 能哭会睡 像人一样栩栩如生
[02:03.74]
[02:06.35]鲁道夫转身离开 像喷气飞机一样掠过天际
[02:10.17]
[02:13.05]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[02:16.51]
[02:19.50]圣诞老人让他加快速度
[02:21.22]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[02:22.88]
[02:25.73]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[02:27.33]我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
